actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Internet.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Internet

official_title: To authorize an additional district judge for the district of Puerto Rico and to convert to permanent status the temporary office of bankruptcy judge for the district of Puerto Rico.
short_title: Puerto Rico Federal Judicial Improvement Act

summary.text:
Puerto Rico Federal Judicial Improvement Act

This bill requires the President to appoint an additional district judge for the district of Puerto Rico and converts two temporary bankruptcy judgeships in that district to permanent judgeships.

titles.title: Puerto Rico Federal Judicial Improvement Act
To authorize an additional district judge for the district of Puerto Rico and to convert to permanent status the temporary office of bankruptcy judge for the district of Puerto Rico.
Puerto Rico Federal Judicial Improvement Act
